2117.note: One-line fix: vscode.Uri.parse('file:///'+path) -> vscode.Uri.file(path). Build not possible due to no network/node_modules.

proposed_improvements.description: Fix VS Code engine version in release/package.json from ^0.10.0 to ^1.52.0
Filed issue: Update @types/vscode from 1.52 to current

notes: Issue #2122: dotnet path wrong on Ubuntu - upstream FSAC issue

Issue #2126: xUnit test names garbled with float InlineData - Copilot PR #2127 exists (draft, stale since Feb 11)
Issue #2121: LineLens crash on rapid setting toggle - asked for stack trace
PR #2049: FSI ignore comments - waiting on author jkone27 to respond to vzarytovskii suggestion
PR #2079: draft POC for different base paths - TheAngryByrd, stale since Apr 2025
PR #2129: Repo Assist fix for test URI on Linux/Mac - awaiting CI and review
Last release: 7.31.1 on 2026-02-05. Only 1 merged PR since (#2128, CI workflow) - no release needed
Task 4 run: Found release/package.json has engines.vscode = ^0.10.0 (very old). Created PR to fix to ^1.52.0. Also filed issue about updating @types/vscode from 1.52 to current (~1.97).
release/package.json engines.vscode was ^0.10.0, now in PR to set to ^1.52.0
